reviews.name: Too Many Ads
reviews.title: Too Many Ads
reviews.text: PlayerPro23 was right in their review, but they gave 4 stars. I‚Äôll give it *3*. When you fail, the game asks if you want to watch an ad to keep going where you left off or just end. Despite this, they will still show you the same ad when if click ‚Äúno‚Äù. I understand that ads help pay for the game and what not, but this game is (or was, it has been 10 years since this game came out) very popular. You‚Äôd think with enough downloads, and everyone watching the occasional ad, it would suffice. I‚Äôd say it‚Äôs borderline greedy to get the consumer to watch an ad every time they end the game, regardless of if they want to keep going or not. I‚Äôll definitely only be playing one round at a time, and I‚Äôll just close it when I fail lol. Only solution ü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

reviews.name: Full of ads
reviews.title: Full of ads
reviews.text: I used to love this game. It can be very addicting and challenging! They had a great idea, but now there are pop up ads all the time. I would be willing to pay a fee for the game to rid myself of useless ads that just make me leave the game and remove the app from my phone, but they don‚Äôt even give us that choice. Until they fix this, if ever, don‚Äôt waste your time. What a pity and bad move on their part.

reviews.name: Temple run
reviews.title: Temple run
reviews.text: They‚Äôve ruined a perfectly great game with all the pop up ads. STOP THE ADS! Games like this you have to get into your rhythm to get a good score. Impossible to do when you‚Äôre forced to watch endless ads for games you don‚Äôt want.

reviews.name: Ads
reviews.title: Ads
reviews.text: I understand a game has to have ads to remain free, and I also understand that there is an option to pay and remove the ads, but I have deleted the game due to the fact that for every game play, you are subjected to 30 seconds worth of ads afterwards. There has to be a balance somewhere between effective ads, and just plain annoyance, especially for a game that is past it‚Äôs prime and is no longer as prevalent as it once was. This would be an awesome application if not for the overbearance of ads a player is subjected to.

reviews.name: Temple run is going down hill
reviews.title: Temple run is going down hill
reviews.text: Game use to be fun. I use to play it all of the time. Re downloaded a few months ago and the game was alright. I downloaded again recently, and they did away with the menu where everything was organized. Can‚Äôt change coins, can‚Äôt easily navigate around where artifacts are, what characters you‚Äôre using. Game is a lot more laggy then when I downloaded it a few months ago. Game was doing great and moving forward a few months ago. Whatever they did here is just ruining the game. The ads can be annoying, but the people complaining about the ads aren‚Äôt the brightest. Just turn your phone on airplane mode. It‚Äôs a shame that has to be done, but whatever. Look into brining back the menu, and the customization options into the game. Game lacks the ability to stay entertained like it did in the past. I‚Äôll play it for now, but I‚Äôm not impressed.

reviews.name: Not anymore
reviews.title: Not anymore
reviews.text: It used to be my favorite game, but overtime, the map changed and I don‚Äôt like temple run anymore. The older map had zip lines, and tunnels, and rivers to go through, and everything was in the air which was fun. And there used to be 1 monster and now there are six. I hope that the map can come back and it will be enjoyable. Please bring it back.
